unit.comment: /* Macro to test whether a weak-loaded CFM function exists */
unit.cpp:define: #define PyMac_PRECHECK(rtn) do { if ( &rtn == NULL ) {\ PyErr_SetString(PyExc_NotImplementedError, \ "Not available in this shared library/OS version"); \ return NULL; \ }} while(0)
unit.function_decl: static pascal OSErr GenericEventHandler(const AppleEvent *request, AppleEvent *reply, refcontype refcon);
